attributes.action: Hold a general election on October the 24th.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament agreed to the referendum and sanctioned article 50 . They are now doing everything they can from stopping the UK from leaving the EU . They have also rendered the executive toothless.
attributes.background: Progress must be made with Brexit and at this moment in time the democratic wishes of the people are being denied by Parliament. A general election will give the people their say .
